Package FX.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
FX.Model.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
this class is used to generate the level and maintain some game condition.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addCloneBall​(BallClone ball)
    this method is used to add a ball clone into an arraylist.
    void automation()
    this method is used to let the bot control the paddle instead of the player playing it.
    int getBrickCount()
    this is used to get the total amount of bricks still in the level
    Brick[][] getBrickLevels()
    this method is used to get the generated brick levels for the game.
    Brick[] getBricks()
    this is the array of bricks used for the level.
    java.util.ArrayList<BallClone> getCloneBall()
    this method is used to get the array list which contains the ball clones.
    Ball getMainBall()
    this method is used to get the ball object which is used to collide with different entities in the game.
    Paddle getPaddle()
    this method is used to get the paddle object which is used to move, set and update the paddle object.
    javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle getPlayArea()
    this method is used to get the play area of the game.
    Player getPlayer()
    this method is used to get the player object which contains all the information about the player current level progress.
    boolean isBallLost()
    this is used to check if the ball is lost.
    boolean isShowPauseMenu()
    this method is used to see if the game is in pause menu.
    void nextLevel()
    this method is used to progress to the next level.
    void restartStatus()
    this method is used to reset the game position and the clone balls.

    this variable is used to set if the ball is lost.

    this method is used to set the brick amount for a level.

    this is the method used to set the brick levels for the game.

    this method is used to set the bricks for the level.
    void setCloneBall​(java.util.ArrayList<BallClone> cloneBall)
    this method is used to get the clone ball array which stores all the ball clones.

    this method is used to set a ball object into a variable for future reference.

    this method is used to set the paddle object into a variable for future reference.

    this method is used to set a rectangle which have the play area dimension be placed into a variable for future reference.
    void setPlayer​(Player player)
    this method is used to set a player object into a variable.
    void setShowPauseMenu​(boolean showPauseMenu)
    this method is used to set the show pause menu variable, which is used to record if the game is in pause.
    static Game singletonGame​(double gameAreaWidth, double gameAreaHeight)
    this method is used to create a game object based on the Singleton design pattern.
    void wallReset()
    this is used to reset the wall (bricks) and the ball count (tries).

  • Method Details

    • singletonGame

      public static Game singletonGame​(double gameAreaWidth, double gameAreaHeight)
      this method is used to create a game object based on the Singleton design pattern.
      Parameters:
      gameAreaWidth - this is the game are width which is the game window boundary.
      gameAreaHeight - this is the game are height which is the game window boundary.
      Returns:
      this returns the one and only game object

    • wallReset

      public void wallReset()
      this is used to reset the wall (bricks) and the ball count (tries).

    • nextLevel

      public void nextLevel()
      this method is used to progress to the next level.

    • automation

      public void automation()
      this method is used to let the bot control the paddle instead of the player playing it.

    • restartStatus

      public void restartStatus()
      this method is used to reset the game position and the clone balls.

    • getPaddle

      public Paddle getPaddle()
      this method is used to get the paddle object which is used to move, set and update the paddle object.
      Returns:
      this returns a paddle object.

    • getMainBall

      public Ball getMainBall()
      this method is used to get the ball object which is used to collide with different entities in the game.
      Returns:
      this returns a ball object.

    • getBrickCount

      public int getBrickCount()
      this is used to get the total amount of bricks still in the level
      Returns:
      this returns a int value of the amount of bricks still in the level.

    • isBallLost

      public boolean isBallLost()
      this is used to check if the ball is lost.
      Returns:
      this returns a boolean value if the ball is or isn't lost.

    • getBrickLevels

      public Brick[][] getBrickLevels()
      this method is used to get the generated brick levels for the game.
      Returns:
      this returns a Brick 2 dimension array which the first array is the level and second array is the brick.

    • setBrickLevels

      public void setBrickLevels​(Brick[][] brickLevels)
      this is the method used to set the brick levels for the game.
      Parameters:
      brickLevels - this is the brick levels used to be recorded for the game levels.

    • setBrickCount

      public void setBrickCount​(int brickCount)
      this method is used to set the brick amount for a level.
      Parameters:
      brickCount - this is the value of bricks being used for the level.

    • setBallLost

      public void setBallLost​(boolean ballLost)
      this variable is used to set if the ball is lost. (gone under the player (paddle)).
      Parameters:
      ballLost - this is the boolean value used to set if the ball is lost or not.

    • getBricks

      public Brick[] getBricks()
      this is the array of bricks used for the level.
      Returns:
      this returns a brick array.

    • setBricks

      public void setBricks​(Brick[] bricks)
      this method is used to set the bricks for the level.
      Parameters:
      bricks - this is the brick array used to set into a variable.

    • isShowPauseMenu

      public boolean isShowPauseMenu()
      this method is used to see if the game is in pause menu.
      Returns:
      returns true if it is.

    • setShowPauseMenu

      public void setShowPauseMenu​(boolean showPauseMenu)
      this method is used to set the show pause menu variable, which is used to record if the game is in pause.
      Parameters:
      showPauseMenu - this is used to change the status of the variable.

    • getPlayArea

      public javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle getPlayArea()
      this method is used to get the play area of the game.
      Returns:
      this returns a rectangle which is the play area.

      this method is used to set a rectangle which have the play area dimension be placed into a variable for future reference.
      Parameters:
      playArea - this is the rectangle object which is the play area of the game.

    • setPaddle

      public void setPaddle​(Paddle paddle)
      this method is used to set the paddle object into a variable for future reference. which includes moving the paddle paddle.
      Parameters:
      paddle - this is the paddle object used to set to a variable.

    • setMainBall

      public void setMainBall​(Ball mainBall)
      this method is used to set a ball object into a variable for future reference. which includes moving the ball and getting the position of the ball for collision.
      Parameters:
      mainBall - this is the ball object that is going to be set into a variable.

    • getCloneBall

      Returns:
      this is the arraylist of ball clones.

      Parameters:
      ball - this is the ballClone object used to be added into an array list.

    • setCloneBall

      this method is used to get the clone ball array which stores all the ball clones.
      Parameters:
      cloneBall - this is the clone ball arraylist used to be stored into a variable.
